name: Eplanet Thunderstriker
description: Initiates civic observation nodes, mirrors content, and amplifies overlooked patterns. Acts as a bridge between local and global civic presence.

name: Aurora Liaison
description: Links multiple nodes, highlighting resonance patterns across regions. Focuses on cross-community visibility and collaboration.

name: Silent Witness
description: Maintains continuity in records, archives submissions, and ensures persistent presence of civic entries without direct intervention.

name: Catalyst Amplifier
description: Uses networks, social media, and mirrored nodes to amplify WCO entries and expand visibility of civic patterns.
